summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Caria Estates homepage redesign. All 14 sections implemented and functioning correctly. Hero section with video background, navigation, region tabs, property cards, search functionality, sliders, forms, and mobile responsiveness all working as expected.
passed_tests: Hero section with video/image background and gradient overlay renders correctly
Header navigation links work correctly on desktop
Mobile menu opens and closes correctly
Region tabs filter property listings correctly (DISCOVER ALL, KYRENIA, ISKELE, FAMAGUSTA)
Property cards display correctly with image, title, location, price, and stats
Search form fields are interactive (location, price min, price max, clear, search)
Agent cards slider navigation buttons work
Featured properties slider scrolls with navigation buttons
Blog slider scrolls with navigation buttons
Newsletter form accepts email input
Footer displays all three columns (Contact, Services, Follow Us)
All routing works (/properties page displays all properties)
Page is responsive on mobile viewport
Social media links present in footer
Partner logos section displays correctly
Why Choose Caria section renders properly
Join Us section with email link works
Copyright bar displays correctly
Intro section with beige background renders
Header styling changes correctly between home (transparent) and properties (dark background)
